channel.title: trip on Jorge Cortell blog
channel.description: Recent content in trip on Jorge Cortell blog

item.title: In Orlando for ASHG
item.description: Last Wednesday I took a day trip to Orlando, FL, to attend the American Society of Human Genetics 2017 meeting.

item.title: A few months in Canada
item.description: For a variety of reasons, we have decided to move to Canada for 5 months. Our Canadian adventure begins:

item.title: One day in Brussels
item.description: Monday September 25 I had to go to Brussels to attend a European Commission Expert Group meeting.

item.title: Cruise Day 6: Dubrovnik
item.description: Our 6th day onboard the Windstar Star Breeze cruise took us to Dubrovnik (Croatia).

item.title: Cruise Day 5: Kotor
item.description: Our 5th day onboard the Windstar Star Breeze cruise took us to Kotor (Montenegro).

item.title: Cruise Day 3: Giardini Naxos
item.description: Our third day onboard the Windstar Star Breeze cruise took us to Giardini Naxos (Italy).

item.title: Cruise Day 2: Amalfi
item.description: Our second day onboard the Windstar Star Breeze cruise took us to Amalfi (Italy).

item.title: 3 days in Rome
item.description: Before boarding on our cruise, we spent 3 days in Rome.
